[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: StaticMethodCall {
                target: Identifier(
                    SimpleIdentifier(
                        SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                7,
                            ),
                            value: "Foo",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                span: Span(
                    1,
                    10,
                ),
                method: Variable(
                    VariableVariable(
                        VariableVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                12,
                            ),
                            variable: SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        1,
                                        13,
                                    ),
                                    name: "a",
                                },
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                arguments: ArgumentList {
                    comments: CommentGroup {
                        comments: [],
                    },
                    start: Span(
                        1,
                        15,
                    ),
                    arguments: [],
                    end: Span(
                        1,
                        16,
                    ),
                },
            },
            semicolon: Span(
                1,
                17,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
